column4: i did it! i found the cause of the bug in Save (Save As) dialogs that erased the user-written file name on folder change!
one of the two blocking bugs in gtk+
no fix yet, i have to come back to my usual computer and modify gtk and test-link
i just know what the problem is
if you've found the cause, the fix can't be far behind. I've always hated that, so I'll say thanks in advance
no problem! i enjoyed this little hacking
nikrud: by the way, there seems to be more that one related problem. i fixed the only bug that i could reproduce with feisty
hrm. I'm on gutsy so I think you need to work harder for me ;P
but once a fix is contributed it will appear in gutsy as well of course
actually, im astonished a real gtk+ coder didnt find it before me
the problem is just what i expected it to be :/
you want me explain the bug?   :p dont think so, right?
not really :) I pretty much quit programming in the late 80's , never really learned event driven stuff
